api/gasimo.subtitles.ScriptableEvent.htm.keywords: Class ScriptableEvent Object which you can bind custom events to. Use it by creating an ScriptableObject for every instance of events you want to use. To subscribe, use onEventRaised. To raise, use Raise(). Subtitles automatically calls Raise() when you attach instance of this class to a Subtitle line.
